price: 25. Ma aanuna soo dirin hortaa Rasuulna  aan u waxyoon (Annagoo leh), "Ma jiro Ilaah (Xaq ah oo) aan Aniga (Allaah) ahayn, ee i caabuda (Anigoo keliya).”
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā min qablika min rasūlin illā nūḥī ilayhi annahu lā ilāha illā anā fa-uʿ'budūni
